info.name: Motor Backend Complete API
info.description: Complete API collection for Motor Backend with authentication, health monitoring, S3 file management, PDF document processing with embeddings, and chat management. Includes comprehensive health check endpoints for all services.

item.name: Document Processing

request.description: Process uploaded PDF document and create page-by-page embeddings. Note: The file must be actually uploaded to S3 using the pre-signed URL before calling this endpoint. Full text is not stored at document level, only page content in embeddings.

item.description: Document processing and management endpoints - processes PDF files, extracts text page-by-page, creates embeddings, and stores them efficiently without document-level text duplication
